text: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind.
name: William Shakespeare

text: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
name: William Shakespeare

text: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
name: William Shakespeare

text: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
name: William Shakespeare

text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
name: William Shakespeare

text: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
name: Albert Einstein

text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
name: Albert Einstein

text: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
name: Albert Einstein

text: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
name: Albert Einstein

text: Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding.
name: Albert Einstein
